The variant is the most precise description of an item. With the help of the variant, e.g. colours or sizes of clothing can be specified. Is a part of the unique identification of an item.

The ABC value is a simplified measurement for classifying the rating of a thing. Typical examples in logistics are the ratings of storage locations and items.A = 1 - 333 (good)B = 334 - 666 (medium)C = 667 - 999 (poor)
